product_name: Baffin Snobird Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Maximum warmth is crucial when the cold comes marching in. The Baffin Snobird winter boots will have you ready and raring to go thanks to warm, waterproof protection and comfort-first construction. Waterproof suede leather uppers with rubber shells block rain and wind; single-pull lacing system allows easy on/off. Removable liner booties deliver great insulation and dry quickly when out of the boots; faux-fur lining around cuff adds extra warmth. Flexible midsoles with plenty of arch support supply all-day comfort. Baffin Snobird winter boots feature durable rubber outsoles for reliable traction on a variety of surfaces including snow and ice. Closeout.
short_description: Maximum warmth is crucial when the cold comes marching in. The Baffin Snobird winter boots will have you ready and raring to go thanks to warm, waterproof protection and comfort-first construction.
